title: Biden Says Russia Would Pay ‘Severe Price’ If It Used Chemical Weapons
sub_head: Ukrainian President Zelensky warned Thursday that Russia was setting the stage for such an escalation
body:
President Biden said Russia would pay a “severe price” if it used chemical weapons as Western officials grow increasingly worried that Moscow will resort to deploying chemical, biological or nuclear weapons after struggling to make headway in the war in Ukraine.
“I’m not going to speak about the intelligence, but Russia would pay a severe price if they use chemical weapons,” Mr. Biden said at the White House Friday.
